dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.threat.SecurityThreatActor
dataStructure.description:
An individual or organization that has motive and means to perform a cyber attack.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityThreatActor

child.name: motive
child.description:
A description of the motives ascribed to a given threat.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: motive

child.name: reference
child.description:
A reference to additional information about a threat.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: reference

child.name: securityIncidentAssessment
